name: PersianCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask Persian calendar for the day.”
”Alexa, ask Persian calendar for the date today.”
”Alexa, ask Persian calendar for the date in Iran.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: persian calendar
des: Ask the skill for the day according to the Persian calendar, and it will respond with the day and the date.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
